text: David Darling (March 4, 1941 â€“ January 8, 2021) was an American cellist and composer. In 2010, he won the Grammy Award for Best New Age Album. He performed and recorded with Bobby McFerrin, Paul Winter Consort, Ralph Towner and Spyro Gyra. His best known works were Journal October, Cycles, Cello, Dark Wood, and Prayer for Compassion. Darling died on January 8, 2021 at the age of 79.Obituary: David Darling ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * The Darling Conversations, music philosophy * Musicolog * * Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American cellists Category:American composers Category:Musicians from Indiana Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:People from Elkhart, Indiana Category:20th-century musicians Category:21st-century musicians
title: David Darling (musician)
